parText: Lions are the second largest big cats and one of the animals in Africa big enough to bring down big herbivores like elephants and giraffes
Elephant are the world largest land animal with adult males that can stand up up to 3m and weight 6 ton. Their trunks also habe 150,000 muscle unit
Dolphin is one of the smartest mammal that can be found all over the world and in different environments especially in fresh water
Monkey is a primate mammal that have over 264 different species all around the world. They usually eat nuts, fruits, seeds, and flowers, and live on tree.
There only exist 5 species of Rhino all around the world. Rhinos have poor vision and communicate through Honks, sneezes..,and poo.
Parrots stand out in the bird world with their lovable and cheeky personalities. They are famous for their ability to imitate sound to fit their surroundings.
